name: Mind Prison
description:
Your mind is a prison wrapped with horrors

Try to escape the demons that are sewn with sorrows.

Fight your fear and remember what’s on the walls

for they will lead you to the end of it all…

A Puzzle Horror Role-playing game where you have to escape from “where”? For that you have to first find the key…

Have a great adventure by solving the riddles and navigating your way through the silent hallways…

Credits:

  • Written by: Ishraque Sarwar
  • Music: N.91, FNAF OST, Pacman OST
  • Digital-art/graphics: Ansimuz, Heartbeast, Ishraque Sarwar
  • Improvements: Raiyan Haque, Ayon Rahman, Ishraque Sarwar
  • level-design: Ishraque Sarwar
  • programming: Ishraque Sarwar
  • Especial effects: Ishraque Sarwar
